        public <T> ServiceProperties createServiceProperties(ServiceDefinition<T> exportedServiceDefinition)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceComponent
        Creates ServiceProperties for a given exportedService. Before this method is inoked, the ServiceComponent.exportService(Class, Object, ServiceDefinition) method will be invoked with the same exported ServiceDefinition

      • canBindType

        public boolean canBindType(Class<?> type)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceComponent
        Defines whether this ServiceComponent can be used to bind a bean of a given type. If this ServiceComponent can be used to bind the given type, then #parseServiceProviderUri(Class) should create ServiceProperties that can be passed to #bind(Class, ServiceDefinition, ServiceProperties) to bind to an instance of the given type.
        Specified by:
        canBindType in interface ServiceComponent
        Returns:

      • exportService

        public <T> void exportService(Class<T> providedApi,
                              T provider,
                              ServiceDefinition<T> serviceDefinition)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceComponent
        Exports a given service on the server side. After a service is exported it should be possible to call ServiceComponent.createServiceProperties(ServiceDefinition) to receive ServiceProperties for the ServiceDefinition, and later to call ServiceComponent.bind(ServiceDefinition, ServiceProperties) to get a proxy that can invoke the passied in provider.
        Specified by:
        exportService in interface ServiceComponent
        provider - - The target provider instance
        serviceDefinition - - ServiceDefinition for service to be exported

      • requiresProviderInstance

        public boolean requiresProviderInstance()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceComponent
        Defines whether an instance implementing a provided api is required when invoking ServiceComponent.exportService. If true, Astrix will identify an instance that implements the given api and pass it to the exportService method and never pass null. If this property is false then null will be passed to exportService.
        Specified by:
        requiresProviderInstance in interface ServiceComponent
        Returns:
